_A_ONE_CHECKBOX_COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION_: The AOneCheckbox component represents a single checkbox with the ability to bind to a data model. The checkbox can display text next to it and supports various states and settings.
_A_ONE_CHECKBOX_GROUP_FALSE_VALUE_DESCRI: This example shows how to use false-value to set the value that will be passed to the model when the checkbox is unchecked. In the first case, the value false is passed to the model when the checkbox is not selected. In the second case, if the checkbox is not selected, the value 0 is passed to the model.
_A_ONE_CHECKBOX_GROUP_INDETERMINATE_DESC: This example shows how to use indeterminate to display the indeterminate state of the checkbox. When indeterminate is set to true, the checkbox displays a minus instead of the standard checkmark, indicating an intermediate or indeterminate state.
_A_ONE_CHECKBOX_GROUP_TRUE_VALUE_DESCRIP: This example shows how to use true-value to set the value that will be passed to the model when the checkbox is checked. In this case, when the checkbox is selected, the value 1 is passed to the model.
_A_ONE_CHECKBOX_GROUP_WIDTH_AUTO_DESCRIP: This example shows how to use is-width-auto to control the width of the label next to the checkbox. In the first checkbox, the label has a width set to auto, allowing the text to take up the minimum necessary space. In the second checkbox, the label's width does not change, and it occupies a fixed space.
_A_ONE_CHECKBOX_PROPS_FALSE_VALUE_DESCRI: The value that will be passed to the model when the checkbox is unchecked.
_A_ONE_CHECKBOX_PROPS_INDETERMINATE_DESC: Displays the indeterminate state (indeterminate) where a minus symbol is shown instead of a checkmark.
_A_ONE_CHECKBOX_PROPS_IS_LABEL_TITLE_DES: Specifies whether the label text will be displayed as a title.
_A_ONE_CHECKBOX_PROPS_IS_WIDTH_AUTO_DESC: Adds a special class to the label with the width set to auto.
_A_ONE_CHECKBOX_PROPS_LABEL_ATTRIBUTES_D: Additional props and HTML attributes for customizing the label tag, which is rendered using the AElement component.
_A_ONE_CHECKBOX_PROPS_SLOT_NAME_DESCRIPT: The name of the slot that will be used instead of the default text if a slot with the specified name is passed to the component.
_A_ONE_CHECKBOX_PROPS_TRUE_VALUE_DESCRIP: The value that will be passed to the model when the checkbox is checked.
_A_UI_GROUP_SLOT_NAME_DESCRIPTION_: This example uses slot-name to replace the default label text with custom content. The slot with the name aloha provides a template where the label text and icon are displayed with additional settings. This approach allows you to flexibly customize the label content using standard attributes and components such as AElement.
